distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for rrdtool provides the following fixes:

- CVE-2013-2131: Enhance imginfo format validation checks to prevent crashes. (bsc#828003)
- Add rrdtool-cached sub-package to SLE 12-SP1. (bsc#967671)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Format string vulnerability in the rrdtool module 1.4.7 for Python, as used in Zenoss, allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via format string specifiers to the rrdtool.graph function.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
